verbose_text: For instance, the identification of DNaseI hypersensitive sites (DHSs), regions of DNA sensitive to digestion because of an " open " chromatin state, led to the identification of the globin gene locus control region (LCR) and an erythroid enhancer in the BCL11A gene linked to hemoglobin F levels, now a target of treatment strategies to treat beta-thalassemia and sickle cell disease.
